typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileNameDataFlow as string,
	coloumnNamesDataFlow as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($fileNameDataFlow)]) ~> ParamDataFlow
ParamDataFlow select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns sink(input(
		cust_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParamDataFlowSink
